BLOCK.QRY: INSERT INTO ACTPAY_HRA_GOP_MST (NUM_HRA_ID,STR_HRA_NAME,STR_HRA_CODE,NUM_HRA_RATE,STR_CITY_GRADE,GNUM_SLNO, GDT_GOI_EFFECTIVE_FRM,GDT_GOI_EFFECTIVE_TO,GDT_GOP_EFFECTIVE_FRM,GDT_GOP_EFFECTIVE_TO, GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE, DT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GSTR_REMARKS,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

UPDATE ACTPAY_HRA_GOP_MST SET STR_HRA_NAME=?,STR_HRA_CODE=?,NUM_HRA_RATE=?,GDT_GOI_EFFECTIVE_FRM=TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY'),GDT_GOI_EFFECTIVE_TO=TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY'),GDT_GOP_EFFECTIVE_FRM=TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY'),GDT_GOP_EFFECTIVE_TO=TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY'),GNUM_ISVALID=?,GNUM_SEAT_ID=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,DT_ENTRY_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,GSTR_REMARKS=?, GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? WHERE GNUM_SLNO=? AND NUM_HRA_ID=?
UPDATE ACTPAY_HRA_GOP_MST SET STR_DP_CODE=?,NUM_DP_RATE=?,DT_EFF_FROM_DATE=(?,'DD-MON-YYYY'),DT_EFF_TO_DATE=(?,'DD-MON-YYYY'),NUM_ISVALID=?,STR_REMARKS=? WHERE NUM_SLNO=? AND STR_DP_CODE

UPDATE ACTPAY_HRA_GOP_MST T SET T.GDT_GOP_EFFECTIVE_TO=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')-1),T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')),T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_HRA_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

INSERT INTO ACTPAY_HRA_GOP_MST (NUM_HRA_ID,STR_HRA_NAME,STR_HRA_CODE,NUM_HRA_RATE,STR_CITY_GRADE,GNUM_SLNO,GDT_GOI_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_GOI_EFFECTIVE_TO,GDT_GOP_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_GOP_EFFECTIVE_TO,GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,DT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GSTR_REMARKS,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE ACTPAY_HRA_GOP_MST T SET GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')),GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_HRA_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?

INSERT INTO ACTPAY_HRA_GOP_MST (NUM_HRA_ID,STR_HRA_NAME,STR_HRA_CODE,NUM_HRA_RATE,STR_CITY_GRADE,GNUM_SLNO,GDT_GOI_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_GOI_EFFECTIVE_TO,GDT_GOP_EFFECTIVE_FRM, GDT_GOP_EFFECTIVE_TO,GNUM_ISVALID, GNUM_SEAT_ID, GDT_LSTMOD_DATE,DT_ENTRY_DATE, GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID, GSTR_REMARKS,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE ACTPAY_HRA_GOP_MST T SET T.GNUM_ISVALID=0 , T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=(TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY')),GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=? WHERE T.NUM_HRA_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
